labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: when clicked the overlay goes transparent, no longer able to click on the game. when using bind to close overlay game become responsive again
data.expected_result: instant invite created - resume as normal
data.short_description: Clicking on create instant invite button through the ingame overlay causes overlay to disappear and cannot ever be seen again
data.steps_to_repro: - Open up a game - Open overlay with keybind - click on Create Instant Invite
